Open-source tools for legal aid systems

We build practical civic-tech infrastructure that improves legal aid operations and structural efficiency.

Browse Projects Contribute

What is TheOpenLawLab?

TheOpenLawLab is a public-interest engineering initiative focused on open, reusable legal-aid tooling. Volunteers and domain practitioners collaborate to ship practical tools for intake, communications, and case preparation.

Featured Projects

Caseflow Optimizer

Caseflow Optimizer helps legal aid clinics route requests to the right support track quickly.

Topic: Operations

Legal Area: Civil Legal Aid

Project Type: repository

Updated: Jan 12, 2026

Hearing Reminder

Hearing Reminder provides standard multilingual reminders that reduce no-shows and improve preparation outcomes.

Legal Area: Family Law

Project Type: file

Updated: Dec 16, 2025

Document Intake Checker

Document Intake Checker helps staff and volunteers identify missing paperwork before filing deadlines.

Topic: Intake

Legal Area: Housing
